CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code: self._T.shape = BoxShape(Vector2.zero, Vector2.one, 0) if(self.Entity.CurrentMapName ~= "로비") then self:change_property_begin() end self.GressEff = _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId("model://8b9d055c-d54b-42aa-b3a3-b8055a6ae94a","GressAura",Vector3.zero,self.Entity) self.FireEff = _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId("model://2a39e752-e93b-4c4e-a193-a46d40fbf99d","FireAura",Vector3.zero,self.Entity) self.IceEff = _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId("model://7d047b6b-9a82-440e-8004-98b49782a8d2","IceAura",Vector3.zero,self.Entity) self.GressEff.Enable = false self.FireEff.Enable = false self.IceEff.Enable = false

CodeBlockMethod.Name: AttackNormal
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local playerController = self.Entity.PlayerControllerappend local transform = self.Entity.TransformComponent if playerController and transform then local worldPosition = transform.WorldPosition local attackOffset = Vector2(worldPosition.x + 0.35 * playerController.LookDirectionX, worldPosition.y + 0.35) self._T.shape.Position = attackOffset self._T.shape.Size = Vector2(0.7,0.7)
self:AttackFast(self._T.shape, nil) end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: CalcDamage
CodeBlockMethod.Code: local damage = self.offense_power if(defender.Common == nil) then return end if(defender.Common.is_player == true) then damage = damage*self:cal_property(attacker.PlayerAttack.property,defender.PlayerAttack.property) end if(attackInfo == "z") then damage = damage*0.5 - 7 end if(attackInfo == "property" and defender.Common.is_player) then if(math.floor(self.property) == 0) then self:attack_grass(defender) elseif(math.floor(self.property) == 1) then self:attack_fire(defender,attacker) defender.Common.fire_Entity = attacker elseif(math.floor(self.property) == 2) then self:attack_water(defender) end end if(defender.Common.is_build) then damage = damage*1.3 elseif(defender.Common.is_monster) then damage = damage*0.7 end if(attacker.Common.fever) then damage = damage * 2 end if(defender.Common.fever) then damage = damage / 2 end return damage

CodeBlockMethod.Name: change_ap
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if (self.property) then self.property = nil end --property값이 0,1,2면 각각 풀 불 물 if(property == 0 or property == 1 or property == 2)then self.property = property self.system.PlayerDataComponent.User_Property[self.Entity] = property self:ElementAura() end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: cal_property
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if(attack == defence)then return 1 elseif (attack - defence == 1)then return 1.50 elseif(attack == 0 and defence == 2) then return 1.50 else return 1 end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: change_property
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
if(self.Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end self.Property_UI.Enable = true local i = 1 local str = {"",""}
for k, v in pairs(_UserService.UserEntities) do if(v.Common.is_left ~= self.Entity.Common.is_left) then str[i] = v.PlayerComponent.Nickname .. "님의 속성은 " .. self:print_property(v.PlayerAttack.property) .."입니다." i = 2 end end self.player1.TextComponent.Text = str[1] self.player2.TextComponent.Text = str[2]

CodeBlockMethod.Name: close_UI
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if(self.Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end self.Property_UI.Enable = false

CodeBlockMethod.Name: IsAttackTarget
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
if(defender.Common == nil) then return false end if(defender.Common.is_neutral) then return true end if(defender.Common.is_left ~= self.Entity.Common.is_left) then return true end
return false

CodeBlockMethod.Name: print_property
CodeBlockMethod.Code: local n = math.floor(pro) if(n == 0) then return "풀" elseif(n == 1)then return "불" elseif(n == 2) then return "물" end return ""

CodeBlockMethod.Name: ElementAura
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
if self.property == 0 then self.GressEff.Enable = true self.FireEff.Enable = false self.IceEff.Enable = false
elseif self.property == 1 then self.GressEff.Enable = false self.FireEff.Enable = true self.IceEff.Enable = false elseif self.property == 2 then self.GressEff.Enable = false self.FireEff.Enable = false self.IceEff.Enable = true end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: change_property_begin
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if(self.Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end self.Property_UI.Enable = true local i = 1 local str = {"",""} self.player1.TextComponent.Text = str[1] self.player2.TextComponent.Text = str[2]

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandlePlayerActionEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local ActionName = event.ActionName local PlayerEntity = event.PlayerEntity -------------------------------------------------------- if self:IsClient() then return end
if ActionName == "Attack" then self:AttackNormal() end
